Summary: shaped like a curling rock,about 15ft. in dia.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife went out and there it was, she came back in screaming, myself & the hired man went out,& sure enough,there was this object,parked by our house.itwent up about 3ft,then hoverd there for about 2 min,before takeing off in a se direction,at approx.20% angle.There was no noise & no exhaust from the object,we could see the lights inside,with a bright white ceiling. As it disappeared in about 10-15 sec.it had a flare behind it,I assume that was caused from the friction of the atmosphere.I have 2 witnesses,& we were less than 10 ft. away from it
trends: There have been 70 other sightings in Edmonton
There were no other sightings in Edmonton on or around May 15th 1971
